body.body: Create this subtree and discuss basic structure.

body: (Vorschlag von @HendrikBrueckler) (Was ist notwendig, um weiter zu kommen/gewinnen?)

body.caption: Based on the discussion from 15.04.2024 these Follow up issues were created:
